Got this game at the behest of friends. Utterly worthless outside of party gaming, in which case it's moderately fun. 0/5 on it's own merit as a competitive game, technical 2/5 as a party game only.

If you've seen other reviews complaining about killers having a hard time, none of them are wrong. At the [i]lowest possible ranks[/i] I was being matched against people with upwards of 40 survivor levels, [i]each[/i]. The post-game chat box exists solely for said awful matchups to boast about how great they are for beating a level 5 killer, not to mention that everyone and their mother has the damn self-heal perk or seemingly-infinite charge healing items that let them casually avoid all consequences of literally dancing in front of your face for half a minute at a time.

It's advertised as asymetric. This is technically true. With one notable exception I have never won a ranked game with the killer, the exception being the very first game at the lowest rank, against people in my character level range. With two notable exceptions, those being [i]unranked custom games[/i] I was screwing around in, doing stuff like deliberately picking perks that revolved around getting hooked, I have never once lost a game as the survivor, this despite several games having at least a handful of dedicated killer players with as many as 20 more character levels than me.

The one time I managed to tear through one of those teams by being just plain smarter than them, the third kill self-disconnected from the game the instant I downed them, opening the hatch that they both knew the location of, and letting the fourth player escape within 2 seconds of my downing the third. That's the reason I even bothered to post my first review of a game. One side of the game gets punished for toxic behavior like camping, while the other is unconditionally rewarded for it.

이 게임 문제점
미리 말하지만 이 리뷰는 내 개인적인 감상을 적어놓은 리뷰이고, 간단히 참고로만 보시길
결국 재미와 만족은 개인적이고 주관적인거기에 딱히 이거 봤다고 게임을 욕할 이유가 되지도 않음.

1. 버그
버그가 하나 있다 싶으면 이미 버그가 5개 이상 그 뒤에 숨어있음.

2. 밸런스
생존자만을 우대 해주는 게임답게 생존자만 유리하게 패치되는게 다반사,
킬러 자체가 생존자 비위 맞추는 느낌으로 성능이 만들어지는 경우도 있음.
킬러를 고른다면 미칠듯한 비매너와 숨쉬듯이 보이는 버그를 견디고 게임을 해야하는 부조리함을 겪게되고, 결국 사기 킬러를 하면서 날먹이라고 욕을 먹거나 쓰레기 킬러 하면서 못한다고 조롱 받거나 생존자로 넘어가게 됨.

3. 그로인한 생존자 : 킬러 간의 비율차이로 인한 문제점
진짜 심각할 수준으로 킬러 유저의 비율이 적음 (적어도 한국서버는)
즉, 매칭 시간의 차이가 극명하게 갈림.
킬러를 하면 준비 누르면 잠쉬 숨 몇 번 쉬고있으면 매칭이 잡히는데,
생존자를 하면 랭크가 올라갈수록 점점 레스토랑스의 향기가 풍기기 시작함.

4. 개발진들의 태도적 문제
패치만 몇 개 보면 누가봐도 개발자들이 줏대가 없어보임
유저들 층이 대부분 생존자만 하는 사람들인데도 불구하고
그거 생각도 하지 않고 유저들이 뭐라고 하면
"아앗... 이렇게 고치면 되나?"
라는 느낌으로 뒷북치는 식으로 대처함.

5. 돈아까워서 계속 하게됨
한 번 사고 튜토리얼에 몇 판 매칭 돌리면 2시간(환불 가능시간)이 지나가있음.
문제점은 저 때까지는 문제가 없어보이고 재미있는 게임으로 보임.
2시간이 지나면 슬슬 초심자 구역을 벗어나게 되고 문제점은 이 때부터 한 번에 쏟아져 나옴.
환불을 하고 싶어도 환불을 못하고 돈 아까워하며 접거나
쓴 돈이 아까워서 계속 하게됨.

진짜로 독특한 소재이고, 재미있는 게임이지만,
지금도 앞으로도 문제가 없어지질 않을 소재이고, 그런 게임이니까
더 좋은 게임 찾아 떠나는게 이득일 거임.
그러니까 제발 하지 말아주길 바래요..

I would totally recommend this game to anyone. There is a learning curve to it for both killer and survivor, but once you can understand and master it you will enjoy this game for many months or even years to come. Just be prepared to deal with toxic survivors that will always shut you down no matter how good you are, be ready for weird hit boxes and other things, but the game is good and the DEVS are working and listening to the community for the most part. HF and GL!

This game is wonderfully infuriating and a lot more entertaining if you have a team to play with. It's also quite addicting once you get the hang of it. Gotta keep working at leveling up and getting your skills built up.

Well, there is a lot of things to say about this game. It is or should I rather say was an amazing game. What I do like about the game is its concept and that's mostly it.

Pros:
It is fun to play as a survivor especially with three more friends. Even more fun is a private lobby with five people. 

Cons:
The Killers have way more advantages than the Survivors. Compared to when the game launched it is hard to find a lobby. Sometimes you wait 20-30 minutes. The reason being why we call it the Lobby Simulator. The Survivors are most of the time trying to block you or spam you with a flashlight. A lot of the Killers just camp or tunnel which makes it hard for survivors to properly escape. New players have a hard time getting into the game because most killers are way too good. 

There is not a lot more I can say. I will definitely continue playing it with friends only but I would not recommend buying it.
Very fun to play :)
